channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A bright spot for turtles: Olive ridleys are recovering in India, but still at risk
item.description: India's olive ridley turtle numbers appear to have rebounded after years of patchwork efforts to stem their decline. Can it last?

item.title: Israeli forces kill at least 10 in southern Syria raid, officials and residents say
item.description: Syria's foreign ministry said in a statement Friday that the attack was "a horrific massacre" and said women and children were among those killed.
